author: Jacob Gallagher
title: From Jay-Z to Gucci, How the Yankees Hat Became Bigger Than Baseball
text:
I don’t know what Alessandro Michele thinks about baseball. I have no idea if the designer who turned Gucci’s aesthetic into a blissed-out marriage between Willy Wonka and Marie Antoinette spends his down time reviewing spring training scores or watching the Hot Stove for trades.

What I do know is that Mr. Michele loves New York Yankees ball caps. With incredible frequency, the Rome native will throw a Yankees hat atop his signature Samson-ian locks. There he is taking a bow after the fall 2017 Gucci runway show in a green...
